Name: CODE:VALKYRIE II
About the game: Battle through soul-like fields with high quality, cute models and exhilarating guns and blades. This game contains clothing destruction, sexual events. Summary ・This game contains clothing destruction and sexual events. ・Although the game volume is not large, this game will make you have a high-quality experience. Destruction of clothes and defeat events: ・All Costumes Can Be Destroyed. ・Private Rooms Can Be Invaded. ・There are many hidden elements, let's explore every corner of the field! About the specifications [Important]: ・When you start the game for the first time, please reset the graphics settings to default. ・The action part is for gamepad (Xbox controller is assumed and vibration is supported). Play Tips ・Middle Click While Aiming Will Shoot Grenades. ・Press and hold the middle button to fire a grenade. ・If you jump at the right time after the blade lands, you can make a long jump. ・If you are not good at action, there are safe ways and routes to attack enemies.
Meta Title: CODE:VALKYRIE II: Jan 24, 2022, Ulimworks and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on CODE:VALKYRIE II? Check out the release date (Jan 24, 2022), developer insights from Ulimworks, and a complete game summary.
